track.name: The Earth Dies Screaming
comments: Echoing the person below, I wish they were more reknowned for this track and it's ilk.
Along with Food For Thought and King The best trax they every did,just enuff to snuff the memrory of Red Red Wine......Arrgh
love it, memories of the school disco :)
Must be my favourite, the 8:31 mins original version. Best heard travelling through an arrid desert.
one of my favourite UB40 tracks

The Best UB40 Track By Miles,

slow summer nights , no internet to confuse , music and women , reggae and blues ,
My favourite UBs track, and one of the most gorgeous songs ever. Respect!
